52.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

47.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

5.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

14.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)

43.movie_name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil (1997)
43.movie_plot: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

51.movie_plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

74.movie_plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

8.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.
